name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Postmark
description: This is a repository of postmark APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Postmark
apis.description: Trusted by thousands of developers, Postmark is a fast and reliable transactional email service. Send with Postmark to ensure your transactional emails get to the inbox on time, every time.
